summary: The comment section is highly polarized and emotionally charged, with a strong sense of solidarity among Muslims against perceived injustices by the Indian government. There is significant anger and defiance, particularly in relation to the India-Pakistan conflict, censorship, and human rights violations in Kashmir. The high controversy score and toxic comment count indicate a deeply divisive topic, with comments reflecting a wide range of emotions from solidarity to outright hostility. The presence of multiple languages and the mention of various countries highlight the international interest and concern over the issues discussed.
title: India Banned Me â€“ Now They're Targeting Children, Women & Mosques in Pakistan
